ovdesc.p: DX.CO.MANUAL.INPUT acts as an input feed into the Derivatives closeout engine.
The application is designed to receive input from the closeout script supplied with the module. This can be activated by using enquiries DX.CO.MANUAL.FUTURE or DX.CO.MANUAL.OPTION

desc.p: If set as authorised this field with ensure that any closeout fed from the application with automatically be authorised.
A multivalued list of transactions to be used as part of a T24 derivatives closeout.
DO NOT INPUT DIRECTLY INTO THIS APPLICATION
Must be a valid DX.TRANSACTION record
Key of the associated DX.CLOSEOUT record.
A multivalued list of lots relating to each of the transactions to be used as part of a T24 derivatives closeout.
DO NOT INPUT DIRECTLY INTO THIS APPLICATION
The record key for this table.
